algorithm.name: NLLBTRANSLATION
algorithm.description: Uses No Language Left Behind to perform translations.

properties.name: FEED_FORWARD_PROP_TO_PROCESS
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection to consider translating. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be translated. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. At most, one property will be translated.

properties.name: TRANSLATE_ALL_FF_PROPERTIES
properties.description: When set to true, translate all properties in the FEED_FORWARD_PROPS_TO_PROCESS list. When set to false, only translate the first available property in the FEED_FORWARD_PROPS_TO_PROCESS list and don't use the prefix in front of TRANSLATION in the output property.

properties.name: NLLB_MODEL
properties.description: Name of NLLB model to use (e.g. facebook/nllb-200-3.3B).

properties.name: LANGUAGE_FEED_FORWARD_PROP
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection determine the language from which to translate. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be used. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. If none are present, fall back to DEFAULT_SOURCE_LANGUAGE.

properties.name: SCRIPT_FEED_FORWARD_PROP
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection determine the script from which to translate. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be used. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. If none are present, fall back to DEFAULT_SOURCE_SCRIPT.

properties.name: SENTENCE_SPLITTER_CHAR_COUNT
properties.description: Integer value specifying maximum number of characters to process through sentence splitter.

properties.name: SENTENCE_MODEL
properties.description: Name of sentence segmentation model. Supported options are spaCy's multilingual `xx_sent_ud_sm` model and the Where's the Point (WtP) `wtp-bert-mini` model.

properties.name: SENTENCE_MODEL_CPU_ONLY
properties.description: If set to true, only use CPU resources for the sentence detection model. If set to False, allow sentence model to also use GPU resources (for Docker deployments, please consult README for more info).

properties.name: SENTENCE_MODEL_WTP_DEFAULT_ADAPTOR_LANGUAGE
properties.description: More advanced WTP models will require a target language. This property sets the default language to use for sentence splitting, unless `SOURCE_LANGUAGE` or `DEFAULT_SOURCE_LANGUAGE` are set to a different, WtP-supported language option.

properties.name: SENTENCE_SPLITTER_INCLUDE_INPUT_LANG
properties.description: Specifies whether to pass input language to sentence splitter algorithm. Currently, only WtP supports model adjustments by input language.

properties.name: TARGET_LANGUAGE
properties.description: The ISO-639-3 language code for language and script that the input test should be translated to.

properties.name: TARGET_SCRIPT
properties.description: The ISO-15924 language code for language and script that the input test should be translated to.

properties.name: DEFAULT_SOURCE_LANGUAGE
properties.description: The ISO-639-3 language code for language and script that the input text should be translated from.

properties.name: DEFAULT_SOURCE_SCRIPT
properties.description: The ISO-15924 language code for language and script that the input text should be translated from.

actions.name: NLLB TRANSLATION TEXT FILE ACTION
actions.description: Performs Nllb translation on a plain text file.

actions.name: NLLB TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Performs Nllb translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

tasks.name: NLLB TRANSLATION TEXT FILE TASK
tasks.description: Uses No Language Left Behind to perform translation on a plain text file.

tasks.name: NLLB TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Uses No Language Left Behindto perform translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

pipelines.name: NLLB TRANSLATION TEXT FILE PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Nllb translation on a plain text file.
